data.title: Saint, Surfer and CEO: A Remarkable Story about Living Your Heart's Desires
data.meta_description:
Written in Robin Sharma's engaging fictional style this book tells the story of Jack Valentine, a man whose path in life is similar to Robin Sharma's own. Feeling very incomplete in life he set out on a search to live a happier healthier and more beautiful life through a series of meetings with three remarkable teachers. Jack discovered a powerful philosophy to reshape his reality and access his destiny.
In this revolutionary yet gentle guide to living your life at its most authentic level, you'll how to awaken your true gifts and shine powerfully in the world; how to transform your fears into freedom and your wounds into wisdom; lessons to help you master your mind, open your heart, and nurture your spirit; simple methods to have beautiful relationships filled with true love; ways to inject adventure, mystery, and fun back into your life; and, tools to become a star in your career and attract prosperity.
data.text:
Written in Robin Sharma's engaging fictional style this book tells the story of Jack Valentine, a man whose path in life is similar to Robin Sharma's own. Feeling very incomplete in life he set out on a search to live a happier healthier and more beautiful life through a series of meetings with three remarkable teachers. Jack discovered a powerful philosophy to reshape his reality and access his destiny.

In this revolutionary yet gentle guide to living your life at its most authentic level, you'll how to awaken your true gifts and shine powerfully in the world; how to transform your fears into freedom and your wounds into wisdom; lessons to help you master your mind, open your heart, and nurture your spirit; simple methods to have beautiful relationships filled with true love; ways to inject adventure, mystery, and fun back into your life; and, tools to become a star in your career and attract prosperity.
